title: HOUR 1 - Great Defenses Need to Anchor Limited QBs Like Tua
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Great Defenses Need to Anchor Limited QBs Like Tua
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin opens up the show speaking on the Miami Dolphins and how QB Tua Tagovailoa isn't reliable. Limited quarterbacks like Tua win by having great defenses support them with deception and trickery. Plus, Colin explains the reality of Lakers PG Russell Westbrook.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
